title: Favorite Publisher Lists
description: Manage your favorite publisher lists and track your preferred partners.
noListsDescription: You haven't created any favorite publisher lists yet. Create your first list to organize your preferred publishers.
deleteSuccessDescription: The favorite publisher list has been deleted successfully.
deleteError: Failed to delete the favorite publisher list. Please try again.
confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the list "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone and will remove all publishers from this list.
loadError: Failed to load favorite publisher lists. Please try again.
noPublishersInListDescription: This list doesn't contain any publishers yet. Add some publishers to get started.
removeSuccessDescription: The publisher has been removed from the list successfully.
removeError: Failed to remove publisher from the list. Please try again.
listNamePlaceholder: Enter a name for your list
createSuccessDescription: Your favorite publisher list has been created successfully.
createError: Failed to create list. Please try again.
addToFavoritesDescription: Add {{domain}} to one of your favorite publisher lists.
noFavoriteListsFound: No favorite lists found. Create one first.
notesPlaceholder: Add any notes about this publisher...
addSuccessDescription: {{domain}} has been added to your favorite list!
addError: Failed to add publisher to favorites. Please try again.
selectListRequiredDescription: You need to select a favorite list to add this publisher to.
